channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: New Hampshire country club shooting leaves 1 dead and several wounded. Suspect in custody
item.description: Authorities say a gunman opened fire in a New Hampshire country club on Saturday, killing one person and wounding several others.

item.title: Trump and MAGA movement will honor Charlie Kirk at Arizona memorial
California bans most law enforcement officers from wearing masks during operations
